org.terrier.realtime.memory

Class MemoryDocumentIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.realtime.memory.MemoryDocumentIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, DocumentIndex
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MemoryDocumentIndexFields, MemoryDocumentIndexMap

    public class MemoryDocumentIndex
extends Object
implements DocumentIndex, Serializable
    An in-memory version of the Document index. Stores the length of each document.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Richard McCreadie, Stuart Mackie
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • iteratorOverEntries

        public Iterator<Map.Entry<Integer,DocumentIndexEntry>> iteratorOverEntries()
        Return an iterator over the document index. iterates over Map.Entry, where the key is the integer docid - only used my the Memory index, not the index-on-disk.
